Reference

All functions

beta()

Beta function for dual numbers

deriv()

Extract the derivative (tangent) part of a dual number

differentiate2()

Compute value, first and second derivatives of a function

Ops(<dual>,<dual>) Ops(<dual>,<numeric>) Ops(<numeric>,<dual>) `+`(<dual>,<missing>) `-`(<dual>,<missing>) `!`(<dual>)

Arithmetic and comparison operators for dual numbers

atan2(<dual>,<dual>) atan2(<dual>,<numeric>) atan2(<numeric>,<dual>)

Two-argument arctangent for dual numbers

dual-class

Dual Number Class for Automatic Differentiation

as.numeric(<dual>)

Coerce dual to numeric

c(<dual>)

Combine dual numbers into a dual_vector

is.numeric(<dual>)

Check if a dual number is numeric

log(<dual>)

Logarithm with optional base for dual numbers

Math(<dual>)

Math group generic for dual numbers

Math2(<dual>)

Math2 group generic for dual numbers

max(<dual>) min(<dual>)

Piecewise max and min for dual numbers

show(<dual>) show(<dual_vector>)

Display a dual number

Summary(<dual>)

Summary group generic for dual numbers

dual()

Create a dual number

dual2_constant()

Create a second-order dual constant

dual2_variable()

Create a second-order dual variable

dual_constant()

Create a dual constant (derivative seed = 0)

dual_variable()

Create a dual variable (derivative seed = 1)

`[`(<dual_vector>,<numeric>) length(<dual_vector>)

Indexing and length for dual_vector

dual_vector-class

Dual Number Vector

dual_vector()

Create a vector of dual numbers

dualr-package dualr

dualr: Forward-Mode Automatic Differentiation via Dual Numbers

erf()

Error function

erfc()

Complementary error function

first_deriv()

Extract first derivative from a second-order dual

hessian()

Compute the Hessian of a log-likelihood

is_dual()

Test whether an object is a dual number

lbeta()

Log-beta function for dual numbers

observed_information()

Compute the observed information matrix

psigamma()

Polygamma function for dual numbers

score()

Compute the score (gradient) of a log-likelihood

score_and_hessian()

Compute score and Hessian from an analytical score function

second_deriv()

Extract second derivative from a second-order dual

value()

Extract the value (primal) part of a dual number

value2()

Extract function value from a second-order dual
